options.query:
{{`UPDATE products
SET 
    product_name = '${components.textinput2.value}',
    quantity = ${components.numberinput5.value},
    status = '${components.dropdown5.value}',
    price = ${components.numberinput6.value},
    category = '${components.dropdown6.value}',
    description = '${components.textarea3.value}'
WHERE id = ${components.table1.selectedRow.id}
AND is_active = true;`}}

events.message: Failed to update product details! Please check and try again.

options.query:
{{`SELECT *
FROM products
WHERE
    is_active = true
    AND (
        product_name ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        status ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        description ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%' OR
        category ILIKE '%${components.table1.searchText}%'
    )
ORDER BY id DESC;`}}
